title: Do as You See Fit!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Hey, Hanamaru-san! Have you ever read this? It’s the source material for my next play.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I have! Wow, this brings back memories, zura~ Which role are you playing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m playing the role of the traveling performer.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Oh! That’s Maru’s favorite character!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What aspect of this role do you think is the most crucial for me to focus on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Have you already read this book?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yep. I’ve got some ideas about how I want to perform, but I also wanted to hear what a fan of the original work, like you, thinks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thanks for asking for my opinion! But Maru believes in you, zura! Just show us the traveling performer that you envision!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hanamaru-san...!! Got it! I’ll work hard to make you say you love my play’s traveling performer as much as the original!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yay! I’m looking forward to watching your performance, zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
